name: Death and Taxes (itch) (TheKhekk42)
description:
The IRS has found you! After committing roughly 2.8 billion dollars of tax evasion, you've tried to escape! But that won't stop them... 

A Vampire-Survivors-Like Rogue-Like Featuring

  • Dynamic upgrade trees
  • A currency based upgrade system
  • Multiple weapons and enemies
  • Thrilling bosses

And more! *

Work in Progess

* To be added in the full game.
